title: Missed Fajr due to sleep. What to do? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: waking up after fajar an hour late what should he do you should pray the Sunnah two Rakas make a palma pray the father two rakahs and then you make your car he says isn't this too late for that car of car works from fajar prayer till the evening then you protected the whole time if you say it at 11 o'clock then before 11 o'clock from fajar till 11 o'clock you're not protected so yes whenever you wake up you say it without any problem
